meanings.definition: Of or relating to a chapter.
meanings.sent1: The chapteral meeting discussed important topics.
meanings.sent2: The book had a chapteral structure, making it easy to follow.
meanings.sent3: The chapteral organization of the event made it run smoothly.
meanings.sent4: Her life felt like a chapteral novel, with distinct phases.
meanings.sent5: The chapteral details in the story painted a clear picture for the readers.

meanings.sent1: The chapteral book was divided into neat sections.
meanings.sent2: I enjoyed the chapteral layout of the textbook.
meanings.sent3: The chapteral division of the project helped us stay organized.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were like a chapteral sequence, each leading to the next.
meanings.sent5: The chapteral structure of the report made it easy to navigate.

meanings.definition: In the style of a chapter.
meanings.sent1: The chapteral transitions in the play kept the audience engaged.
meanings.sent2: Her speech had a chapteral flow, moving from one point to the next.
meanings.sent3: The chapteral way he told the story added suspense.
meanings.sent4: The journey felt chapteral, with each step revealing a new aspect.
meanings.sent5: The chapteral pacing of the movie made it exciting to watch.
